Title: Real Secure Algo

Category: Cryptography

Rank: Epic

Hint: search up how to solve an RSA

Question:

```
p: 
q: 
e: 65537
Ciphertext: 
```

Looking at the question pattern and the title of this challange I could conclude that this is an RSA question.

If you don't know what RSA is look at this: https://www.cryptool.org/en/cto/highlights/rsa-step-by-step

If you don't know how to solve RSA look at this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4zahvcJ9glg

I forgot what script, I used for the RSA but you could use [this website](https://crypto.stackexchange.com/questions/19444/rsa-given-q-p-and-e) or [this online calculator](https://www.cs.drexel.edu/~jpopyack/Courses/CSP/Fa17/notes/10.1_Cryptography/RSAWorksheetv4e.html).

After you solve it you will get a plain text.

Plain text: 149691910197814696842665803457256918072255423858557

According to question you have to convert plaintext to Hexadecimal => BASE64 => text

Then you will get the answer.

Answer: flag{R$A_I$\_AnN0Y!NG}
